component.name: Turnip Twaddler
component.description: If you've got turnips to twaddle, this is the tool for you! Comes with a .

component.name: Prawn Goader
component.description: Unruly prawns? With this handy tool, you'll have the most well-behaved seafood in town.

component.name: Clam Teaser
component.description: Everyone knows they're proverbially happy, but what to do with a shy clam? Bring recalcitrant mollusks out of their shells with this entertaining gadget. Includes a festive .

component.name: Cucumber Decorating Kit
component.description: Cucumbers are a staple of summertime entertaining, but it's unlikely they'll be the most beautiful thing on your table. Rescue them from blandness with this exciting tool.

component.name: Lemon Snubber
component.description: What's more annoying than an unsnubbed lemon? With this tool and a quick flick of the wrist, you'll never have that problem again. Includes a replacement for years of use.

component.name: Olive Bruiser
component.description: Few things are more elegant than a bowl full of bruised olives. Unfortunately, few of us have the time to hand-bruise them unless it's a special occasion. With this tool, you'll have bruised olives every night! Includes both a and a .

part.name: Pitter
part.description: Removes pits from olives and cherries in no time at all.

part.name: Patter
part.description: We're not sure what these things do, but people seem to like 'em.

part.name: Spanner
part.description: You can't fix anything without one.

part.name: Feather Duster
part.description: Dust be gone! (Note: This part is not hypoallergenic.)

part.name: Grommet
part.description: Gives everything a finished, professional look.

part.name: Mucilage
part.description: It's an adhesive, a salad dressing, and so much more!

part.name: Ribbon Curler
part.description: Endless hours of fun, even if you're not wrapping a gift.
